name: DB2 Limited
description:
DB2 is a software development agency whose priority is quality. It has earned the trust and respect of a wide variety of organizations, from top start-up businesses; companies that are leaders in their field and renowned brands, like Samsung.
DB2 specializes in iOS, Android and web applications. It builds digital products that allow people to accomplish tasks in the most efficiently. If you share your idea with DB2’s team, it will work alongside you to deliver a revolutionary digital product. Its clients have transformed the way people use the following digital products: dating apps; educational courses; choosing insurance premiums and using drones to stream videos.
Our main expertise:
- Social
- E-commerce
- Sport
- Dating 
- Food delivery
- Education
- CRM/CMS/ERP
- Healthcare  
- Events
- Audio/Video/Streaming
- IOT / Hardware
- Tax
- Booking
- Insurance
Design services
- UI/UX
- Interactive mockups
- Animations 
Front-End development services
- Angular, React, Vue, Vanilla, TypeScript, ES6, electronJS, RxJS
Back-end development services
- Python 2 /3, Node.js
- Django / Django REST Framework / Flask / Pyramid / Bottle
- Koa.js, Express.js, Hapi.js, 
- PostgreSQL / MySQL / MongoDB / MariaDB / DynamoDB / SQLite 
- AWS EC2 / S3 / RDS / Route53 / EBS / Heroku / Digital Ocean / mLab
- AWS SES, Mandrill, Mailchimp, Sparkpost
- CI/CD, Kubernetes, Docker
Android development services
- Java, Kotlin
- RxJava, RxBus
iOS development services
- iOS, tvOS, watchOS 
- Objective-C, Swift 
- ARKit
Please let us know if you have any further questions, and we are looking forward to hearing from you.
